description.plain:
Baseball pitcher turned country superstar, Brett Young has come a long way from writting music on his guitar in his bedroom.

He started his career by Making two full length album’s on small record labels, On Fire and Broken Down, which all of the songs he wrote entirely on his own or co wrote.

He was signed to major record label Big Machine Records and released his first EP, Brett Young  in 2016, 3 years after his previous minor record label album. It released 4 singles Like I Loved You, You Ain’t Here To Kiss Me, In Case You Didn’t Know, and Sleep Without You, 3 of which were hits in the United States.  In 2017 he released Brett Young which had 3 of the previous singles off his first EP on it plus 2 more singles, Like I Loved You and Mercy. He released his sophmore album released from Big Machine Records on September 10, 2018, it features the singles Here Tonight (which was a major instant hit on the BB Country Charts) and Catch.

body.plain:
Baseball pitcher turned country superstar, Brett Young has come a long way from writting music on his guitar in his bedroom.

He started his career by Making two full length album’s on small record labels, On Fire and Broken Down, which all of the songs he wrote entirely on his own or co wrote.

He was signed to major record label Big Machine Records and released his first EP, Brett Young  in 2016, 3 years after his previous minor record label album. It released 4 singles Like I Loved You, You Ain’t Here To Kiss Me, In Case You Didn’t Know, and Sleep Without You, 3 of which were hits in the United States.  In 2017 he released Brett Young which had 3 of the previous singles off his first EP on it plus 2 more singles, Like I Loved You and Mercy. He released his sophmore album released from Big Machine Records on September 10, 2018, it features the singles Here Tonight (which was a major instant hit on the BB Country Charts) and Catch.

songs.title: Mercy
songs.embed_content: Read “Mercy” by Brett Young on Genius
songs.lyrics:
16 ContributorsMercy Lyrics[Verse 1]
Mercy
Why you gotta show up lookin' so good just to hurt me?
Why you wanna stop this whole damn world from turning?
Mercy
Why you hanging on so tight if this ain't working?
Why you wanna stop this flame if it's still burning?
'Cause it's still burning

[Chorus]
So if you're gonna break my heart, just break it
And if you're gonna take your shot, then take it
Take it
If you made up your mind, then make it
But make this fast
If you ever loved me
Have mercy

[Verse 2]
If you go out tonight and get drunk and lonely
Wind up home alone
Please don't call me
And say you miss me, no

[Chorus]
If you're gonna break my heart, just break it
And if you're gonna take your shot, then take it
Take it
If you made up your mind, then make it
But make this fast
If you ever loved me
Have mercy
You might also like[Bridge]
Whoa
Oh, have mercy

[Chorus]
If you're gonna break my heart, just break it
And if you're gonna take your shot, take it
Take it
Oh, if you're gonna break my heart, just break it
And if you're gonna take your shot, then take it
Take it
If you made up your mind, then make it
Make this fast
If you ever loved me
Mm, if you ever loved me
Have mercy

[Outro]
Oh, have mercy
Oh, have mercy
Have mercy12Embed

songs.full_title: In Case You Didn't Know by Brett Young
songs.title: In Case You Didn’t Know

description.plain:
“In Case You Didn’t Know” is a song by Brett Young, released as the second single from his debut self-titled EP. The song was later included on his debut self-titled album.

The song had a major impact on the Billboard charts, peaking at #2 on the US Hot Country Songs chart. The song has also made a huge impact on the Hot 100 chart, peaking at #19, as of June 10th, 2017. This is Brett’s first song to reach the top 3 on the Billboard country chart, and his first song to reach the top 20 on the Hot 100.

Lyrically, the song is a love song where Brett expresses his love and affection for his significant other.
